titleStmt.title: [The lyfe of the thre kynges of Coleyne]
Historia trium regum. English
titleStmt.author: Joannes, of Hildesheim, d. 1375.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Joannes of Hildesheim. Liber de gestis et translatione trium regum.
Leaf A2r reads: "Prologus. Here begynneth the lyfe of the thre kynges of Coleyn".
Imprint from colophon; suggested publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
